description: The scene depicts a heavenly environment populated by dogs, each wearing a halo. An angelic figure, holding a clipboard, addresses a group of these celestial canines floating on clouds. Below, another group of dogs ascends a long staircase, also wearing halos. The angelic figure is directing the dogs, suggesting a classification or sorting process is occurring in this afterlife setting. This creates a surreal scenario where common earthly dog behaviors like car-chasing apparently persist and are relevant in the spiritual realm.
caption: “Okay now, listen up! ... First, I want all the car-chasers over here!”
